name: Monotonous
description:
Controls:

WASD/ZQSD for moving, left click takes the objects, right click activates the objects

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We present you our game created during the GameJam Lundum Dare 47: "Monotonous".

In Monotonous we play an office worker, who has to perform tasks in order to reach the end of the day ... and then start again the next day!

[[SPOIL]] Until we discover that there is good? not following the rules! From there a new vision of the world is offered to us. Will you be able to survive?
[[SPOIL +]] the objective is to not follow the rules, to rise to the level of destruction of the world and to survive one day at level 4 of destruction!

we are a team of 3 video game students in France.

Thesandgamer: GD main prog, gestion

Théo Guerin : 3d

Anthony Di Giovanni : GD, LD, secondary developer
